text: (Napiye!) Ivvare umakku nam kattalaiyai vahyin mulamaka arivikkirom. (Itarku munnar) nir vetam innatenrum, nampikkai innatenrum arintavaraka irukkavillai. Ayinum, (inta vetattai umakku nam vahyi mulam arivittu) atai oliyakavum akki, nam atiyarkalil nam virumpiyavarkalukku ataik kontu nerana valiyaik kanpikkirom. (Napiye!) Niccayamaka nir (atan mulam makkalukku) nerana valiyaik kanpikkirir
